columns.Description: Optional description providing additional information related to the profile
columns.Name: ProfileDescription

columns.Description: Platform of the operating system running on the device. This indicates specific operating systems, including variations within the same family, such as Windows 10 and Windows 7
columns.Name: OSPlatform

columns.Description: Version of the operating system running on the machine
columns.Name: OSVersion

columns.Description: Industry benchmark on top of which the profile was created
columns.Name: BaseBenchmark

columns.Description: Version of the industry benchmark on top of which the profile was created
columns.Name: BenchmarkVersion

columns.Description: Benchmark compliance level set for the profile
columns.Name: BenchmarkProfileLevel

columns.Description: Indicator of the profile status - can be Enabled or Disabled
columns.Name: Status

columns.Description: Identity of the user account who created the profile
columns.Name: CreatedBy

columns.Description: Date and time when the profile was created
columns.Name: CreatedOn

columns.Description: Identity of the user account who last updated the profile
columns.Name: LastUpdatedBy

columns.Description: Date and time when the profile was last updated
columns.Name: LastUpdatedOn
